title: Christmas Poro Art Contest!
body:
It's that time of year when poros are running around everywhere like the lovable living snow balls they are! So in commemoration of poros and xmas I am holding a community art competition. The reward given out will be a $10 RP card giveaway at the end of this week (Saturday the 20th). I will be the one judging.

The rules are simple. 

1. You must use Microsoft paint

2. You cannot use Pen and Art computer tablets, only a mouse.

3. It has to be xmas themed and have at least ONE poro visible in the picture.

I will not be officially in the competition, but I made one anyway. Good luck!

Also, don't eat the yellow snow :)

I do not stream (often), but you can often find me on twitch if you want to. Let me know if ya do.

replies.body: How can you tell if someone uses a mouse or not. I'm a fine arts graduate and I have a lot of experience with drawing with just the mouse/a tablet. I'm just saying, I dont want to spend hours on a poro piece using a mouse in microsoft paint to be told, nah. you used a tablet.
I can tell. Besides, I will be pretty lenient towards that particular rule. I am more interested in it being drawn with paint and the themes behind it.
Thank you. And I see what you mean "I know"

WE HAVE A WINNER!

This artist most certainly has the taste and skills to pay those Snowdown skin bills! 






Drum roll please.








Besteau! Has won the $10 RP Card for this art contest, but it was not an easy victory. There were many beautiful and cute moments brought forth by the league community and for that I think everyone watching thanks you! As an honorable mention and runner up Kimeii made a similar yet unique take on the act of gift giving that makes you go "Awww."

Besteau I will be sending you a request in game to give you that RP code.

Gj everyone and have a merry Christmas/Snowdown!

Thank you so much. I wanted to apologize about my absence. I recently got a new job and I have been working 12 hour days and thinking about making a pax east cosplay. Thanks again. 

P.s. Just got my internet up n running since my other old job couldnt pay the bill so to speak.

I don't have micropaint. 

i used something i found online.

I hope its okay. (BTW its not blood, it's kechupp)

I finally finished it! I use Microsoft Paint, only a mouse, and it's X-Mas themed! Not as good as the rest, but I tried!

(I hope I made it in time, since there was no specific time the contest ended. Oh wait it just turned the 20th cause it's past midnight. Derp.)
Is it over?! I'ma make one right now, I just need an hour!! I just found this! :OOO
Here's my entry.  I found your contest just in time!  :D
I'm on EUW :/. Can I participate anyway?
Made one anyway, hope you like it ^^

Unfortunately, I do not have anyway to get my hands on an EU RP card, but if you make an account on NA then I can :P

As far as participating goes, you are more than welcome to join!
Aw I won't participate then, merry xmas!
I have a NA account as well ^^

Only couple more days and the competition is starting to heat up! Who will win? Find out on the next episode of drag..

Show up on the 20th.



Also I bet you read that in the DBZ intro voice once you got the reference.
All the poros are so cute!
Not really christmas themed but it is snowdown themed! {{summoner:31}}
